- The immediate adjacent tiles (up, down, left, right) are:
  - Up (4, 5): a wall ('d')

The right tile is the only one I can move to, which will help me explore further and make progress toward either collecting resources or moving towards the exit.

Following the strategy to prioritize my next move, I will attempt to move right to (5, 6):
